channel.title: Has /b/ solved another murder?
channel.description:
Okay, I know this is related to 4chan, and STFU, this is REALLY interesting. Now, Someone posted a thread, guess your post number and I'll post the location of James Joesph (Whitey) Bulger (FBI's most wanted) Someone indeed did this. And I was there to witness the WHOLE thing. [IMG]http://i35.tinypic.com/11kk3ma.png[/img] [IMG]http://i34.tinypic.com/k3wv7s.png[/img] ----------DIFF THREAD [IMG]http://i37.tinypic.com/16h6kw0.png[/img] [IMG]http://i33.tinypic.com/rsd54w.png[/img]
I'm almost 90% sure these people wern't trolling, because we've solved murders in the past. (Gallery of /b/) Anyway, is it true what they say? Is /b/ better then the FBI?
Discuss, I'm aware that this is related to 4chan and I understand this site will never become 4chan, but This is interesting stuff.
P.s, I reported it to the Feds, also looked it up on Google maps, I don't remember the name, so do it yourself.
EDIT: updated, added more pictures. (I screencaped them)

and I don’t care about scientology, makes me lul tbh.

item.title: Has /b/ solved another murder?
item.dc:creator: @P_I_M_P_3_D_Tut `Lewk_
item.description:
@P_I_M_P_3_D_Tut wrote:

[quote="Aaron, post:40, topic:308066"][quote author=Lewk_ link=topic=404151.msg2994049#msg2994049 date=1255466022]

A website full of creeps, porn, gore, and stalkers.

*A website full of necrophiliacs, pedophiles, hermaphrodites and retarded memes that were never funny.
[/quote]Cry more please.

`Lewk_ he states the truth, 4chan is the scum of the internet.[/quote]
That means nothing.
Your opinion was more truthful, as Kihomura’s ‘list’ is probably a bunch of big offensive words his tiny mind could think of.
Just because we make memes, and WE think they’re funny, and YOU need to be a fucking ‘No-Sense of humour faggot’, and judge everything we do. Honestly, I bet if you made a joke, and everyone at Moparscape was laughing, but everyone at MITB thinks your a fucking douche because you said/did something that their not used to. You would feel like a faggot, am I right?

Grow up, it wasn’t even the fucking point of the thread, Kihomura.
We don’t give a fuck about your faggy attempts of being ‘cool’ and flaming a site you probably never visited.
Now, pull your tampon out of your ass, take off your dress and FUCK OFF. Because no one gives a shit what you say, neither do I, I’m only addressing you because YOU’RE probably the one thats going to get this fucking thread locked, because I can’t stand faggots like you with egos as big as china’s population.
[center] This isn’t 4 chan, I really don’t care. He has an opinion, respect it.[/center]

Read full topic

item.title: Has /b/ solved another murder?
item.dc:creator: @P_I_M_P_3_D_Tut `Lewk_
item.description:
@P_I_M_P_3_D_Tut wrote:

[quote=“ChaosPkers, post:27, topic:308066”][quote author=`Lewk_ link=topic=404151.msg2992920#msg2992920 date=1255391089]

So is /b/ a detective angency or what? I’m still a little lost and don’t want to go to 4chan cause people said it was a bad site and shit

Lolwut…

/b/ is the cancer of the internet…
Its just a random board where people post random things, usually over 30,000,000 + pieces of content every week or so.
It’s not a bad site, unless you go to the 18+ sections of 4chan… such as /s/, /gif/, /hc/, /a/, /b/ ect.

@r0ckstar, you may be right.

en.wikipedia.org

Fred

Fred may refer to:


I just edit it.
[/quote]Lol my fault haha. I just thought since /b/ has solved murders before I just kinda guessed they worked for that[/quote]
Ha, not a problem. The only reason we solve things because there are people that know things on /b/ (related, know this person irl, or trolls), also people that like to report things on /b/ too.

Read full topic
